definition: character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Quality and moderation often bring more joy than an excess.
sentences.chinese: 品质和适度通常会比超额带来更多的欢乐。

sentences.english: As for the Song of tea, the tea dust finer, the higher the quality of its tea.
sentences.chinese: 而对于宋茶来说，茶末越细，其茶的品质就越高。

sentences.english: Some additives and preservatives are essential to keep foods quality and freshness.
sentences.chinese: 一些添加剂和防腐剂都必须保持食品的品质与鲜度。

sentences.english: Potassium is particularly important for quality of mandarin oranges.
sentences.chinese: 钾对中同柑的品质的影响尤其突出。

sentences.english: In part, because of the quality of social relationships.
sentences.chinese: 部分原因出在社会关系的品质优劣上。

sentences.english: While making friends, we should take care to select those who have such fine qualities.
sentences.chinese: 交友之时，就应选择具有这些优良品质的人。

sentences.english: Pre-conditioner can make better products with high quality.
sentences.chinese: 可配置原料调质系统，使产品品质更佳。

sentences.english: The health mental quality can't be divorced from humanistic spirit edification.
sentences.chinese: 健康的心理品质离不开人文精神的陶养。

sentences.english: Keep quality first, hanker for perfection.
sentences.chinese: 保持品质第一，追求完美。

sentences.english: The quality of Fraiar plum fruit was studied at low temperatures(5.
sentences.chinese: 贮藏对黑宝石李果实品质的影响。

sentences.english: The goods supplied shall only be those of best quality.
sentences.chinese: 本公司的产品制造有极严格的品质管制。

sentences.english: What are the qualities that makes one API easy to use and other hard?
sentences.chinese: 是哪种品质会让一套API易用而另一套复杂难解？

sentences.english: Mr. Wu usually sells high quality arowanas.
sentences.chinese: 吴先生所销售的是高品质的龙鱼。

sentences.english: Effects of rice bran addition on farinograph parameters of dough and quality of steamed bread were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了添加米糠对面团粉质特性和馒头品质的影响。

sentences.english: How to improve the quality of products was a difficult problem to him.
sentences.chinese: 如何提高产品质量对他来说可是个难题。

sentences.english: Superior quality elastic waistband with internal drawstring.
sentences.chinese: 卓越的品质与内部弹性腰带拉绳。

definition: to sample/to taste/to appreciate/one's taste (i.e. in music, literature, fashion, food and drink etc)/good taste
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
quality control (QC), abbr. for 品質控制|品质控制
public praise/public reputation/commonly held opinions/current idiom
